name: Wandering Soul (Leandro Brás)
description:
Developed by:

Programmers: Flávio Santos, Leandro Brás

UI Designer: Sara Gama

Sound Designer: Pedro Torres

Art Designer: Daniel Pinhão

----------------------------------------------------------------

Objective

Get all soul fragments so you can visit your dad on earth one last time.

----------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

Left Arrow - Move Left

Right Arrow - Move Right

Space Bar - Jump (Hold to jump higher)

C - Soul Fire Spell

Z - Soul Ligh Doge

----------------------------------------------------------------

Story

You and your dad were involved in a car accident while your dad was ok you died. When you died you went into purgatory a place between heaven and hell where all lost souls go to.

In here you meet a friend that will tell warn you about this place and explain that you can collect soul fragments to appear on earth on last time so you can say goodbye to your dad before ascending to heaven.
